summary.data: Experienced software developer with years of expertise in developing robust and scalable web applications. Skilled in full-stack development, I have successfully led teams and collaborated with diverse professionals to create innovative solutions for both startups and prestigious large enterprises. A detail-oriented problem-solver, I excel in coding, design, software testing, and debugging. Procient in a wide range of programming languages and frameworks, I have a solid foundation that allows me to adapt quickly to new technologies and deliver high-quality results. Committed to continuous learning and staying up-to-date with industry trends, I bring a passion for software development and a drive to create user-friendly applications that meet business objectives.

data.position: Senior Software Developer Team Lead - Full Stack Engineer
details: Pateh Project (https://pateh.com):
Led a dynamic team in designing and developing 25+ microservices for a cutting-edge product, facilitating daily sales of over a thousand flight tickets through third-party websites.
Managed and coordinated workflows, achieving rapid user growth and exceptional system performance handling 1000+ flight search requests per second.
Technologies: PHP, MySQL, Laravel, Node.js, Nuxt.js, MongoDB, TypeScript, Vue.js, JavaScript.
Iranicard Project (https://iranicard.ir):
Played a vital role in building and enhancing integration within existing systems for international payment and exchange services.
Identified and resolved critical security bugs, optimized database connections, and contributed to enhancing customer experience.
Technologies: PHP MVC, MySQL, AngularJS, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX.
Consistently displayed commitment to excellence and deep understanding of utilized technologies, contributing to project success.

data.position: Full Stack Engineer - Backend Developer - PHP Developer - Node.js Developer
details: Amreton Project (https://amreton.ir/):
Pivotal role in developing and enhancing systems for the Internet Taxi application as a dedicated backend developer.
Responsibilities included creating essential services and APIs, optimizing travel allocation APIs, and migrating the system from REST to WebSocket technology.
Technologies: PHP, Laravel, MySQL, Node.js, NestJS, Express, Angular, JavaScript.
Demonstrated commitment to excellence, contributing to the development and optimization of the Internet Taxi application.
Talamala Project (https://talamala.ir/):
Sole creator of the Talamala project, responsible for developing the Talamela website and two Android applications (user and admin).
Designed and implemented the PHP MySQL backend, ensuring seamless data processing and communication.
Highlights include intuitive website design, user-friendly mobile experience, and efficient admin control application.
Technologies: PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX.
Successfully delivered a comprehensive and integrated solution for the Talamala project.
Undertook various projects creating customized websites and software solutions using WordPress and Microsoft Excel.
Highlights include developing multiple basic websites with seamless user experiences, responsive design, and dynamic functionalities.
Utilized PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, and jQuery to consistently deliver tailored solutions meeting clients' specific requirements.
Gained extensive expertise in electricity and electronics, specializing in designing and repairing electrical and electronic systems for elevators, CCTV cameras, and alarms.
Highlights include designing systems to meet specific requirements, ensuring optimal functionality, and performing repairs for safe and efficient operation.
Consistently delivered high-quality solutions and services leveraging my expertise in electricity and electronics.

primary: PHP (PHP Frameworks like Laravel, Symfony or pure Vanilla php)
secondary: Software Design, Design Patterns, Code Review, Unit Testing, Clean Coding, Solid, Pull Request, Merge Request, Git workflows
Web Development (HTML, JavaScript, AJAX, CSS, Bootstrap, SASS)

data.course: Developing Back-End Apps with Node.js and Express
Web Page Development with PHP and MySQL
